thread.section_title: Flologic Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flologic | flologic.com
thread.title: Allen Herskowitz

author: Allen Herskowitz
title: Allen Herskowitz
text: Flow logic alarms indicated a very low volume but persistent leak. That led to watchfulness so that as soon as the volume was sufficient for the leak detection company to locate the leak we had it repaired. That preceded any show of water in the house...leak was in a manifold on the slab so that at low volume the leakage was running back into the ground. Without the Flologic we would have discovered the leak by water penetration of the walls, with attendant damage.
